DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study obtain implant survivorship clinical outcome data commercially available Zimmer Trabecular Metal Total Ankle implant use primary revision total ankle arthroplasty . The assessment include implant survivorship clinical performance measure pain function , quality life data , radiographic parameter survivorship .
DOC.detailed_description: The study design prospective , multicenter , study commercially available Zimmer Trabecular Metal Ankle semiconstrained implant . The study require site obtain Institutional Review Board approval prior study enrollment . All potential study subject require participate Informed Consent Process . All study subject undergo preoperative clinical evaluation prior primary revision total ankle arthroplasty . The post-operative clinical radiographic evaluation conduct 6 week , 6 month , 1 year , 2 , 3 , 5 , 7 , 10 year . Follow-up survey occur 4 , 6 , 8 , 9 year .
DOC.criteria: The patient > 18 year age The patient skeletally mature The patient qualifies primary revision total ankle replacement base physical exam medical history include follow : degenerative arthritis , rheumatoid arthritis , posttraumatic arthritis . The patient willing able provide write informed consent Patient willing able cooperate require postoperative therapy The patient willing able complete schedule followup evaluation questionnaire describe Informed Consent The patient participate Informed Consent process sign Institutional Review Board/European Commission approve Informed Consent The patient : prisoner , mentally incompetent unable understand participation study entail , know alcohol drug abuser , anticipate noncompliant . The patient one follow compromising affect limb : ankle arthrodesis malleolar exeresis , severe neurological vascular disease , loss musculature neuromuscular compromise , severe instability , maltracking misalignment tibia talus uncorrectable surgery . The patient local/systemic infection may affect prosthetic joint The patient previous history infection affect joint The patient know pregnant The patient insufficient bone stock bone quality fix component ( i.e . osteoporosis , Charcot 's disease ) The patient know sensitivity allergic reaction one implant material The patient unwilling unable give consent comply followup program
